description:
Class 1-A assigns roles for their performance at the school festival, and Gentle starts preparing his next plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bunkasaitte Junbi Shiteru Toki ga Ichiban Tanoshii yo ne
Le plus amusant, c`est les préparatifs
Prepping for the School Festival Is the Funnest Part
الاستعداد للمهرجان الثقافي هو المرحلة الأكثر مرحًا
文化祭って準備してる時が一番楽しいよね
